name: phrases
description: Looks up a phrases in the Endless Sky database.

options.name: phrase1
options.description: phrase to find (ie. band) with optional count (ie. 10 band)

options.name: phrase2
options.description: second phrase to find (ie. drugs) with optional count (ie. 10 drugs)

options.name: phrase3
options.description: third phrase to find (ie. hai) with optional count (ie. 10 hai)

options.name: phrase4
options.description: fourth phrase to find (ie. bunrodea) with optional count (ie. 10 bunrodea)
